actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deductions of the portion of certain taxes which is allocable to the construction of sewage treatment works.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for State and local property taxes that are allocable to the construction or improvement of sewage treatment works, even though such benefits tend to improve the value of the property taxed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deductions of the portion of certain taxes which is allocable to the construction of sewage treatment works.
